attributes.action: All UK schools must have a cultural day every year!
attributes.additional_details: So youths in primary and secondary can show there culture and religion to educate people more about there culture!
attributes.background: To make sure there's a day for different ethnic groups to express themselves whether: clothing,music and religion

rejection.details: The decision to introduce a cultural day is a decision for individual schools, not the Government or Parliament. You could raise this with your school's senior management and/or the governing body.
